name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Carolyn McKENDRICK, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Carolyn McKENDRICK, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Stephen H. Serota, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Deborah Fox, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
453 A.2d 328
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Carolyn McKENDRICK, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 21, 1982.
Decided Dec. 20, 1982.
Stephen H. Serota, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Deborah Fox, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
